articles.content: New Delhi: Honda Cars India Limited company has reportedly decided to end vehicle production at its 23-year-old Greater Noida plant. The entire production line of the Greater Noida facility will be s… [+2200 chars]

articles.title: IDBI Bank raises Rs 1,435 crore from 44 investors - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The shares were issued at a discount of 5 percent to the floor price of Rs 40.63 apiece, it said.
articles.content: IDBI Bank has raised Rs 1,435 crore through an issue of equity shares to 44 qualified institutional investors, according to a regulatory filing. The bank had targeted to raise Rs 2,000 crore (base si… [+1570 chars]
